import React from 'react' import './VideoFooter.css' import { Button, Avatar } from "@material-ui/core"; import FavouriteIcon from '@material-ui/icons/Favorite'; import ModeCommentIcon from '@material-ui/icons/ModeComment'; import SendIcon from '@material-ui/icons/Send'; import MoreHorizIcon from '@material-ui/icons/MoreHoriz'; function VideoFooter({ channel, song, likes, shares, avatarSrc }) { return (

{channel}.

{likes}

{shares}

) } export default VideoFooter
